docblock.description: Constructor
Clears all instance variables.
Returns the "default action" for the current controller object.
Returns the list of used defined properties
Returns the session "scope".
docblock.long-description: The session scope can be one of three predefined values: 'global' When using this value, the session cookie associated with the request will have the path '/'. 'application' When using this value, the session cookie associated with the request will have the path returned by PathBuilder::getTexturaBaseURL(). 'controller' When using this value, the session cookie associated with the request will have the path returned by PathBuilder::buildRoute($current_controller_class).

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If sessions are not used for the current controller

docblock.description: Returns a route to an action in another controller
Returns a route to an action within the current controller
Returns a route to some static content.
Returns whether the current controller class uses a session or not.

docblock.description: Magic setter.
docblock.long-description: This method allows the user to set his/her own properties. The properties can be named anything as long as the name can be represented a normal PHP variable.

tag.description: If the user tries to set a reserved property

docblock.description: Returns a string representation of the current object.

docblock.long-description: This class is responsible for mapping requests to controllers and actions.

tag.name: var
tag.description: array holding the list of active controllers (path => controller_class)

tag.name: var
tag.description: array holding default actions for active controllers

docblock.description: Routes a request and emits a response.
docblock.long-description:
Rules for routing:

1) If an exact match is found, the specified action is called directly 2) If no exact match is found, the "default" action for the current controller is called 3) If no default action is found and the path differs from /, the "parent" path is called 4) Repeat

tag.name: param
tag.description: The request to process

tag.name: param
tag.description: The response to send

tag.name: return
tag.description: This method always returns null

tag.description: validation errors (if any). There can only be validation errors in any of the isValidXXX are used.

docblock.description: constructor
Initializes a new instance of the current class
Returns the value of a specific cookie or null if the cookie is not set.
Returns the list of validation errors (if any) for the current request
Returns whether the current request is a GET request
Returns whether the current request is a DELETE request
Returns whether the current request is a HEAD request
Returns whether the current request is a POST request
Returns whether the current request is a PUT request
Returns whether the current request is a PUT request
Returns whether the current request is considered a "valid" GET request or not.
Returns whether the current request is considered a "valid" POST request or not.
Returns whether the current request is considered a "valid" XHR request or not.

tag.name: param
tag.description: If this parameter is set, only the specified request method will be considered valid. If it is not set, any request method will be considered valid.

docblock.description: Returns whether the current request is an AJAX request
Magic getter.
docblock.long-description: Allows for some shortcuts in the code.

docblock.description: Returns whether the current request is considered "valid" or not.
docblock.long-description: A request is considered valid if it uses the correct request type and and all required parameters are present.

This class represents the Textura "application"

tag.description: current configuration

tag.description: currently registered plugins

docblock.description: Constructor
Loads classes from Textura core and Textura plugins automatically.

tag.name: param
tag.description: class to load

docblock.description: Returns the (single) instance of the Textura class.
Returns a specified configuration option.
docblock.long-description: If the option does not exist, null is returned.

docblock.description: Sets a specified configuration option.
docblock.long-description: If the option does not exist it will be created.

docblock.description: Return all paths registered by plugins.
Loads all plugins requested by configuration file.
Register a plugin to be used by the framework.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Name of plugin to load.

tag.name: param
tag.description: custom directory where plugin can be found. If null, uses TEXTURA_PLUGIN_DIR/$name.

tag.name: param
tag.description: custom file name where plugin can be found. If null, uses plugin_dir/$name.php.

tag.name: param
tag.description: custom class name that should be loaded. If null, uses "{$name}Plugin".

tag.name: param
tag.description: custom namespace that should be used to initialize the plugin class. If null, the "Textura" namespace is assumed.

tag.name: throws
tag.description: if the plugin cannot be loaded for some reason.

docblock.description: Returns a specific configuration option.
docblock.long-description:
Keys support namespaces by using dot notation, so both mykey and mynamespace.mykey are valid keys.

If a key cannot be found, null is returned.

docblock.description: Sets a specific configuration option.
docblock.long-description: Keys support namespaces by using dot notation, so both mykey and mynamespace.mykey are valid keys.

docblock.description: Textura
Class for debugging requests.
docblock.long-description: This class will be loaded automatically by Textura whenever debugging is activated in the config file.

Builds a route to static content within the application.
